prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What are Stefan's true and genuine thoughts, feelings, and intentions towards me?

Please do not immediately assume that I'm looking for romantic inclinations. I am not certain what, if any, feelings exist, and what those feelings are deemed to be. That is the reason I have drawn up the chart, is to get a true determination. So, any biasing towards romantic inclination or otherwise should be removed, and ensure that this chart is interpreted fully and objectively to discern the true nature of the questied's feelings, thoughts, and intentions.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a systematic catalog of the horary chart data as provided, organized under horary principles without interpretation:

1. PLANETARY POSITIONS (Exact Degrees, Signs, and Noted Motions)
 • Sun: 29°58′ Aquarius
 • Moon: 4°29′ Scorpio
 • Mercury: 7°10′ Pisces
 • Venus: 8°18′ Aries
 • Mars: 17°13′ Cancer (retrograde)
 • Jupiter: 11°36′ Gemini
 • Saturn: 19°24′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23°24′ Taurus
 • Neptune: 28°31′ Pisces
 • Pluto: 2°35′ Aquarius
 • North Node: 28°56′ Pisces (retrograde)
 • Chiron: 20°07′ Aries

2. HOUSE CUSPS (Including Assigned Planets from Provided Data)
 • House 1: Starts at 3° Capricorn
  – Contains: Pluto
 • House 2: Starts at 9° Aquarius
  – Contains: Sun, Mercury, Saturn
 • House 3: Starts at 25° Pisces
  – Contains: Venus, Neptune, North Node, Chiron
 • House 4: Starts at 28° Aries
 • House 5: Starts at 20° Taurus
  – Contains: Uranus
 • House 6: Starts at 9° Gemini
  – Contains: Jupiter
 • House 7: Starts at 3° Cancer
  – Contains: Mars
 • House 8: Starts at 9° Leo
 • House 9: Starts at 25° Virgo
 • House 10: Starts at 28° Libra
  – Contains: Moon
 • House 11: Starts at 20° Scorpio
 • House 12: Starts at 9° Sagittarius

3. MAJOR ASPECTS (Including Orb Measurements)
 • MC Opposition IC         – Orb: 0°
 • Neptune Conjunction North Node   – Orb: 0°
 • Moon Sextile Ascendant      – Orb: 1°
 • Sun Sextile IC          – Orb: 1°
 • Sun Trine MC           – Orb: 1°
 • Moon Square Pluto         – Orb: 2°
 • Mars Trine Saturn         – Orb: 2°
 • Venus Sextile Jupiter       – Orb: 3°
 • Mars Square Chiron        – Orb: 3°
 • Moon Trine Mercury         – Orb: 3°
 • Pluto Sextile North Node     – Orb: 4°
 • Saturn Sextile Uranus       – Orb: 4°
 • Mercury Sextile Ascendant    – Orb: 4°
 • Sun Sextile Ascendant       – Orb: 4°
 • Pluto Square IC          – Orb: 4°
 • Pluto Square MC          – Orb: 4°
 • Mercury Square Jupiter       – Orb: 4°
 • Ascendant Sextile MC       – Orb: 5°
 • Uranus Sextile Neptune      – Orb: 5°
 • Neptune Square Ascendant     – Orb: 5°
 • Venus Square Ascendant      – Orb: 5°
 • Ascendant Trine IC         – Orb: 5°
 • Sun Trine Moon           – Orb: 5°
 • Mars Sextile Uranus        – Orb: 6°
 • Venus Sextile Pluto        – Orb: 6°
 • Sun Square Uranus         – Orb: 6°
 • Moon Opposition IC        – Orb: 6°
 • Moon Conjunction MC        – Orb: 6°
 • Chiron Opposition MC       – Orb: 8°
 • Chiron Conjunction IC       – Orb: 8°

4. PATTERNS IDENTIFIED IN THE CHART
 • T-Square Pattern
  – Involving: MC at 28° Libra, Pluto at 2° Aquarius, IC at 28° Aries, Moon at 4° Scorpio
 • Cradle Pattern
  – Involving: Moon at 4° Scorpio, IC at 28° Aries, Sun at 29° Aquarius, Ascendant at 3° Capricorn, MC at 28° Libra

5. SPECIAL CHART FEATURES
 • The Moon is a waning gibbous.
 • The chart is described as a Bucket shape.
 • Dominance of Cardinal mode among the inner planets.
 • Most inner planets are located in the bottom hemisphere.
 • Mars is descending.
 • The Moon is on the Midheaven; Chiron and the IC are on the Nadir.
 • Sextile aspects occur most frequently (11 instances).
 • The Sun is involved in 10 aspects.
 • Neptune in Pisces is in the sign of its rulership.

These are all the outlined data points and structural details extracted from the horary chart using standard horary principles.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is the next-step data extraction—a concise tally of all key horary indicators that will serve as the foundation for interpreting Stefan’s genuine thoughts, feelings, and intentions. This summary is strictly factual, without interpretation:

1. Significator Considerations
 • Stefan’s representation is indicated by his connection to the questioned relationship. With the query asking about his inner state, the 7th House (relationships) is central.
 • The 7th House cusp is at 3° Cancer; its ruling planet is the Moon. The Moon, located at 4°29′ Scorpio in the 10th House, becomes a primary significator for Stefan’s inner emotional world and public intentions.
 • Additional factors (such as Mars in the 7th House at 17°13′ Cancer, retrograde) may also color how his assertive energies play out, although the Moon remains critical for feelings and inner sentiments.

2. House Placements Relevant to Relationship Dynamics
 • House 7 (3° Cancer): Contains Mars (retrograde), suggesting active—but possibly conflicted—energy in relationship matters.
 • House 2 (9° Aquarius): Contains Sun, Mercury, and Saturn; these planets influence the querent’s own state, setting a context for the relational dynamic.
 • House 3 (25° Pisces): Contains Venus, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron; factors here may shape communication and the nuanced subtleties of intentions.
 • House 10 (28° Libra): Contains the Moon, further emphasizing the significance of emotional and public-display elements in the chart.

3. Key Major Aspects Involving Crucial Planets
 • Moon Sextile Ascendant (orb 1°): Indicates a facilitating connection between visible expression and inner emotional tone.
 • Moon Square Pluto (orb 2°): Points to intensity and potential hidden depths, indicating transformative or challenging underlying emotions.
 • Moon Conjunction MC (orb 6°): Merges personal emotional expression with public life or perceived intentions.
 • Moon Opposition IC (orb 6°): Suggests an internal conflict between one’s deep, private feelings and external circumstances.
 • Sun Sextile IC (orb 1°) and Sun Sextile Ascendant (orb 4°): Imply alignment between personal identity and private matters.
 • Mars Trine Saturn (orb 2°) and Mars Square Chiron (orb 3°): Reflect disciplined energy with potential healing challenges in assertive actions.
 • Mercury Sextile Ascendant (orb 4°) and Moon Trine Mercury (orb 3°): Highlight communication connections linking inner thoughts with outward behavior.
 • Venus Sextile Jupiter (orb 3°): Implies ease of connection in value and expansion; while Venus Square Ascendant (orb 5°) suggests potential tension in personal expression.
 • Other aspects—including Uranus Sextile Neptune (orb 5°) and Sun Square Uranus (orb 6°)—offer additional layers noting sudden shifts or unexpected elements.

4. Identified Configurations
 • T-Square: Involving MC (28° Libra), Pluto (2° Aquarius), IC (28° Aries), and with the Moon (4° Scorpio) as a key player within this structure.
 • Cradle Pattern: Involving the Moon (4° Scorpio), IC (28° Aries), Sun (29° Aquarius), Ascendant (3° Capricorn), and MC (28° Libra); this configuration adds nuance to the interplay between personal, public, and inner sentiments.

5. Special Chart Features and Context
 • The Moon is a waning gibbous, adding a phase-specific quality to its expression.
 • The chart presents as a “Bucket shape” with a dominant Cardinal mode among the inner planets and a concentration in the bottom hemisphere—indicators of dynamic, initiating energy in personal matters.
 • Mars is descending, further emphasizing its retrograde status in the 7th House context.
 • The frequency of sextile aspects (11 in total) and the extensive involvement of the Sun (10 aspects) mark a chart in which harmonious yet complex energies interplay.
 • Neptune in Pisces is in rulership, adding clarity to its role in shaping subtle, intuitive impressions.

This cataloged data represents all the elements extracted according to horary principles without bias towards any particular relationship type. Please review these details, and confirm if you’d like to continue with the interpretative step-by-step analysis using the dual-layer process outlined.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is the dual‐layer analysis for Stefan’s genuine thoughts, feelings, and intentions as indicated in the horary chart.

────────────────────────────
Layer One – Raw Data Summary

• Significators and House Emphasis:
 – The 7th House cusp falls at 3° Cancer; its ruler is the Moon.
 – The Moon is placed in Scorpio at 4°29′ in the 10th House.
 – Mars, located in the 7th House (17°13′ Cancer, retrograde), provides an additional indicator of Stefan’s active energy.
 – The Moon’s role is further emphasized by its integration into a Cradle configuration along with the Sun (29° Aquarius), Ascendant (3° Capricorn), IC (28° Aries), and MC (28° Libra).
 – The T-Square formation involves the MC at 28° Libra, Pluto at 2° Aquarius, IC at 28° Aries, with a participant Moon at 4° Scorpio.

• Key Aspects Involving Primary Planets:
 – Moon Sextile Ascendant (orb 1°) – linking inner feelings to outward expression.
 – Moon Square Pluto (orb 2°) – a marker of intense, transformative emotional currents.
 – Moon Opposition IC (orb 6°) – suggesting internal conflict between private emotions and external demands.
 – Moon Conjunction MC (orb 6°) – integrating personal feelings with public projection.
 – Mars Trine Saturn (orb 2°) – signaling a structured or disciplined channel for assertive energy.
 – Mars Square Chiron (orb 3°) – indicating potential wounds in the way assertiveness is expressed.
 – Additional supportive aspects include Sun Sextile IC, Sun Sextile Ascendant, Mercury Sextile Ascendant, and Moon Trine Mercury.
 – Venus Sextile Jupiter (orb 3°) and Venus Square Ascendant (orb 5°) hint at tensions in personal value expression.

• Special Chart Features:
 – The Moon is a waning gibbous, influencing its expressive quality.
 – The chart is of Bucket shape with a predominance of Cardinal energy among the inner planets.
 – A concentration of most inner planets in the bottom hemisphere strengthens the emphasis on personal and initiating dynamics.
 – Mars is descending; its retrograde nature in the 7th House further characterizes the active relational energy.
 – Neptune in Pisces (in rulership) and its close connection to the North Node provide a subtle layer of idealization or elusive sentiment.
 – The preponderance of sextile aspects (11 total) indicates opportunities for facilitating connections despite underlying tensions.

────────────────────────────
Layer Two – Nuanced Contextual Analysis

 I. Inner Emotions and Public Projection:
  • The Moon, as the primary significator, reveals that Stefan’s emotional and intuitive responses are intense and transformative. Its placement in Scorpio in the 10th House suggests that his inner life is not only deep but is also expressed or recognized in a public or goal-oriented arena.
  • The Moon’s sextile with the Ascendant indicates that his genuine feelings can be visible, aligning his private emotions with how he presents himself. However, the Moon’s square to Pluto adds a note of intensity, potential secrecy, or transformative struggles beneath the surface.
  • The opposition between the Moon and the IC emphasizes an internal conflict between his private emotions and the external expressions or expectations placed upon him.

 II. Assertive and Action-Oriented Dynamics:
  • Mars in the 7th House, though retrograde, speaks to an energy that is slower, more cautious, or even conflicted in its direct expression towards relationships. This retrograde motion suggests internalized hesitation or an inward review of how to act on his feelings.
  • The supportive Mars Trine Saturn aspect indicates that while there is caution, there is also a controlled or disciplined way he channels his assertive energies.
  • The square of Mars with Chiron points to potential vulnerabilities or past wounds that may influence how boldly he acts on his emotions, possibly keeping his intentions guarded.

 III. Communication and Integration:
  • The presence of Mercury Sextile the Ascendant and Moon Trine Mercury underscores that his thoughts and communications are linked to his inner emotional state. This could favor a thoughtful approach to expressing feelings, although these signals may be multifaceted.
  • The integration of the Sun through its sextile aspects to both the Ascendant and IC hints at some alignment between his core identity, personal boundaries, and private emotions, supporting a sense of authenticity in his responses.

 IV. Configurational Patterns and Overall Relational Tone:
  • The T-Square configuration involving MC, Pluto, and IC, with participation from the Moon, reflects a tension between public identity, deep-seated emotional transformation, and private emotional needs. This pattern implies that Stefan’s internal experiences are charged with both potential for depth and conflict.
  • The Cradle configuration, with the Moon supported by the Sun, Ascendant, IC, and MC, suggests a systemic interweaving of personal identity and emotional expression. It points to a scenario where despite inherent tensions, there is a capacity for a nurturing integration of his feelings if external and internal demands align.
  • The general influence from Neptune (in rulership) and the Node (conjunction) evokes an idealized or elusive quality to his internal states, making it possible that his feelings or intentions may be filtered through a layer of fantasy or idealism.

────────────────────────────
Final Relational Signature Based on Data

• Stefan’s genuine thoughts and feelings are characterized by intensity and transformation. His emotional nature (represented by the Moon) is deep, complex, and at times conflicted; he is inclined toward introspection and experiences internal tension between public projection and private sentiment.
• While his communication channels appear functional in conveying authentic inner feelings, the presence of Mars retrograde in the 7th House and its associated aspects suggest caution. There is evidence of hesitancy or internal review in taking assertive action.
• The overall configuration (including T-Square and Cradle patterns) points to a layered personality where genuine feelings are intertwined with both vulnerability and the capacity for public expression. His inner sentiments may sometimes be obscured by emotional intensity and transformational dynamics, rendering his intentions less straightforward.
• No single indicator forces a bias toward a solely romantic interpretation. The data indicates emotional complexity that may involve a commitment to personal ideals as well as a guarded assertiveness that is not necessarily overtly amorous.
• The combined influence of supportive aspects (sextiles, trines) with challenging ones (squares, oppositions) confirms that Stefan’s psychological and emotional state is nuanced; his thoughts and intentions are subject to both deep personal reflection and a measured approach in outward behavior.

This concludes the detailed, step-by-step analysis of the chart’s data concerning Stefan's true thoughts, feelings, and intentions.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you for the very detailed interpretation. So what is your final conclusion?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on the comprehensive horary chart analysis, my conclusion regarding Stefan's true thoughts, feelings, and intentions towards you is multifaceted:

The chart reveals that Stefan harbors deep, complex emotions that are primarily introspective and transformative in nature (Moon in Scorpio, 10th House). However, these feelings are currently in a state of internal review and hesitation (Mars retrograde in 7th House).

His genuine thoughts and feelings appear to be marked by:
1. Intense emotional depth
2. Cautious expression
3. Internal conflict between private feelings and public presentation
4. A need for careful consideration before taking action

The chart strongly suggests that Stefan is experiencing a period of significant emotional processing and transformation regarding his feelings toward you. While there is definite emotional intensity, he appears to be carefully weighing and examining these feelings rather than rushing to express them.

The retrograde Mars in the 7th House, combined with the Moon's aspects, indicates he may be reconsidering or reevaluating his approach to your relationship. This isn't necessarily negative - rather, it suggests he's taking time to understand his own feelings and intentions more deeply.

His current state appears to be one of thoughtful contemplation rather than immediate action. The chart suggests he values authenticity in his emotional expression but needs time to fully process and understand his own feelings before making them known.

In essence, Stefan appears to be in a phase of deep emotional consideration regarding his relationship with you, marked by genuine feeling but also by careful, measured approach to expression and action.
